question: 切符
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>cut</kanji> <kanji>token</kanji> is a token you cut out from a sheet of paper into smaller sheets, and each of these pieces is a <vocabulary>ticket</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is <ja>切る</ja> cut short to <ja>きっ</ja>, then <ja>ふ</ja> rendaku'd to <ja>ぷ</ja>. It's a bit of a troublesome word, so concentrate on this now a bit so you can get it in the reviews.
